body.name: Sweetcrispy Folding Mattress, 3 inch Tri-fold Memory Foam Mattress Topper for Camping, Foldable Mattress Topper with Washable Cover, Guest - Twin Size, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 12 hrs 33 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: MULTIPURPOSE DESIGN - Our foldable mattress can be freely converted between a recliner, a sofa and a bed to meet your different needs. Allowing you to enjoy a good time hosting guests, playing games with your kids, traveling, camping and yoga in any room, even in a tent or car.

SPACE SAVING -The tri fold mattress topper is easy to fold and unfold, easy to carry and store. It can be unfolded or folded in seconds and can be easily stored in cabinets and other tight spaces when not in use.

ENJOYING SLEEP — Sweetcrispy Folding Mattress has a premium structure consisting of 1inches of Gel AeroFusion Memory Foam and 2 inches of Flex Support Base Foam. The gel memory foam allows for temperature regulation and a cool sleeping experience, while the support base foam provides strong support to the body throughout the night. Making our twin mattress topper 4 inch in total thickness.

WASHABLE COVER - Folding mattresses are made of skin-friendly, breathable fabrics, with a center zipper design that allows the cover to be easily removed and machine washed. The non-slip fabric on the bottom keeps the mattress close to the floor and prevents movement.

CERTIFIED - The durability, performance and content of our memory foam is CertiPUR-US certified, which means you can rest assured that our mattresse toppers will provide you and your family with all-day comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple comfy couch for millennial minimalist
reviews.reviewText: I love this! I got rid of my XL futon because it was taking up way too much room. And when I move (again) since I don't own a house, I can just fold this up and take it with me. Good for a minimalist couch. I like how you can set it up into a chair couch as well. It came in at 7am, I put blankets on it, and fell asleep for 5 hours 😅 it's so comfy and you can't feel the creases. It lays evenly and is very thick. I absolutely love it :) and it was in my price range. There are other foldable couches but they are in the $300 range and this one was much less and the value is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wow this product is amazing and for the price you can't beat ir it's very comfy and soft, love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So, my mom had a folding floor mattress when we were kids, and we used it for sleepovers all the time. I've wanted something similar of my own forever, so I was happy to stumble upon this. This feels pretty nice to lay on, but I took off a star because 1) When you first kneel down on it to get on it, your knee sinks to the floor (I think it could be firmer in that regard... although when your weight is distributed, it's fine), and 2), it's actually kind of large to store. My mom's folded in half and could be slid under the bed. Unless your bed frame is super high off the ground, this isn't sliding under your bed unless it's opened all the way up. It's also a little big to shove into a closet. Definitely more comfortable than an air mattress (in my opinion), and I love the fact that, unlike an air mattress, it won't deflate in the night. Love that you don't have to take the time or effort to blow it up (like an air mattress); you just unfold it, and you're good to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have for sleepovers
reviews.reviewText: I have 3 kids, and they are all at the age of wanting to have sleepovers every other weekend. We don't have a blow up mattress, and I ordered this thinking it would be convenient to store and pull out whenever we need it. It's really exactly what I was hoping. It's comfortable once made up with blankets and a pillow, and fits an average sized adult. This would not be suitable for those who are overweight or very tall. My husband is 6 feet tall and his feet hang off a little unless his head is at the very top edge. I'm very happy with it though and it's already been used successfully. I love how easy it is to fold up and put away, it stows away under a bed or in a closet with no issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mattress is comfortable, and the shipment package is compact, expanding to its full size a couple of hours after opening. It's easy to use and ideal for kids' sleepovers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good sleep mattress for a child; great exercise mat for someone who needs more cushion
reviews.reviewText: This is a good size for a smaller adult or a child. Someone over 6 feet tall would probably not find it roomy enough. Also, a heavier person might not be super comfortable sleeping on it directly on the floor, but it works well for a small child. It is a great mat for floor exercises too. I love it because there is so much cushion. I love that it folds up quickly for storage too. I just stick it beside my weight stand, and it's there the next time I need it. Best of all is the washable and removable cover!!! That is a game changer. Even though I use it for exercise, I can easily wash it to use as my granddaughter's nap mat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More comfortable than an air mattress
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a full-time mattress to sleep on - this isn't it. But, if you're looking for a nice comfortable pad to sleep on occasionally, this is fantastic. It's far more comfortable than an air mattress. I had a sick dog recently that couldn't be moved. We placed her on this mattress and I was still able to lay down beside her to comfort her. She was comfortable and so was I. I've also found that this fits perfectly on top of my cot - making it a great temporary bed for guests.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The SWEETCRISPY 4" FOLDING MATTRESS was put to the test immediately! It came compressed and upon unpacking, came to full size within about two hours. It's as long as a queen-sized bed in length and folds in three. It was quite bigger than I imagined. I wanted it for (1) a very tiny space in my house to serve as a sleeping area when there's extra company and (2) I can easily take it in the car with me on road trips. I slept on it for a few hours and it is comfortable. Good quality!💯For it's weight/size, I wish it had the following for when it's not in use:-1. A storage/carry bag2. Handles for easy carry3. A button flap or velcro to hold it together
